channel.title: Need help with mute commands READ FAST#
channel.description:
I need some help im on a 317 allstar source and want to add Mute and Unmute and Ipmute i added this ::mute command but still get an error
[code=c] if (command.startsWith("mute")) { try { String mutedName = command.substring(5); int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer]; m.silent = 2; sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted"); m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute"); } }[/code]

item.title: Need help with mute commands READ FAST#
item.dc:creator: @nietmeer nietmeer
item.description:
@nietmeer wrote:

I need some help im on a 317 allstar source and want to add Mute and Unmute and Ipmute
i added this ::mute command but still get an error

                                if (command.startsWith("mute")) {                                        try {                                                         String mutedName = command.substring(5);                                                                 int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName);                                                                 client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer];                                                                 m.silent = 2;                                                                 sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted");                                                                 m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you");                                                }                                                catch(Exception e) {                                                          sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute");                                                }                                }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with mute commands READ FAST#
